Installation
-------------

.. admonition:: prerequisites
   :class: warning

   NumPy, SciPy

Download either NREL_CSM.py-|release|.tar.gz or NREL_CSM.py-|release|.zip, and uncompress/unpack it.

Install NREL_CSM with the following command.

.. code-block:: bash

   $ python setup.py install

To check if installation was successful import the model or run the example.

.. code-block:: bash

   	$ python
	> from NREL_CSM.csm import csm
	> from NREL_CSM.csm import example
	> example()
